subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Fans stormed the court and tore seats apart at the Greek Cup basketball final. Police used stun grenades. The game was suspended for an hour before Panathinaikos beat Olympiakos.
snippet: Fans stormed the court and tore seats apart at the Greek Cup basketball final. Police used stun grenades. The game was suspended for an hour before Panathinaikos beat Olympiakos.
